lead_paragraph: Russia have replaced their men's under-18 ice hockey squad with the under-17s for this month's world championships amid concerns the players could test positive for meldonium, the Russian Ice Hockey Federation (RIHF) said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Ice Hockey-Russia's World Under-18 Squad Replaced Amid Meldonium Fears
headline.main: Ice Hockey-Russia's World Under-18 Squad Replaced Amid Meldonium Fears

snippet: Russia have replaced their men's under-18 ice hockey squad with the under-17s for this month's world championships amid concerns the players could test positive for meldonium, the Russian Ice Hockey Federation (RIHF) said on Friday....
